Q25: Which bodies are responsible for the review of the national recommendation(s) on physical activity for 
women during/after pregnancy? 
 1   Governmental
 2   Professional
 3   Both, governmental and professional
 4   No information available
Please provide details, including the name of the specific bodies:______________________
Q26: Please select whom the physical activity recommendation(s) are targeting:
 1   Women before pregnancy
 2   Women during pregnancy
 3    Women du
